title: Best of the Program | Guests: Matt Palumbo & Kim Iversen | 1/20/22
description:
Glenn Beck discusses the New York Times book list and his book's current ranking, but is somebody manipulating the algorithm and the numbers? Author Matt Palumbo joins to discuss his new book, “The Man Behind the Curtain: Inside the Secret Network of George Soros.” Kim Iversen, host of "The Kim Iversen Show," joins Glenn to discuss the Great Reset and how many still believe it’s a conspiracy theory despite the evidence.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
